• Open to only Engineering students.


• The short film should not exceed 8-10 minutes.


• The film should not hurt any religious/regional sentiments. Nudity or obscenity is strictly prohibited. 


• Participants must not reveal identity or name of their college in any part of their films.


• Films should either be in English or Tamil.


• At the time of screening, at least 1 member from the cast should be compulsorily present.


IMPORTANT DATES:

 • Last date for film submission online: 18-09-2013

 • Date of notifying the participants regarding the selected films: 21-09-2013


FORMATS:


Films must be submitted in .avi, .mpg formats. Entries submitted in .wmv, .mp4 and other formats will not be considered.


FILM GENRE:


Comedy, Love, or Friendship. 


The link of the movie (YouTube or any other video sharing source) must be sent to the Cognit short film team (FOR SELECTION PURPOSE).

 praveen.abayamb4u@gmail.com 
 venkatramanancs@gmail.com 

 and, the film has to be brought to the event dated on (21/09/2013) in a pen drive or in a CD/ DVD (If Disc, it can be labeled with the name of the film/College name of the Film Crew and the Director/Lead Actor name along with it)
